void FloraBlock::fill ( uint32  numVertsAllowed  ) 

This method fills a vertex allocation with appropriate stuff.

Note all ecotypes are reference counted. This is so flora knows when an ecotype is not used, and can thus free its texture memory for newly activated ecotypes.

void FloraBlock::init ( const Vector2 &  pos,
uint32  offset 
)

Thie method initialises the flora block.

FloraBlocks must be given a position.

Parameters:
pos Vector2 describing the center of the block.
offset number of vertexes offset from start of vertex memory

void FloraBlock::invalidate (  ) 

This method invalidates the flora block.

It sets the bRefill flag to true, and releases reference counts for all ecoytpes currently used.

bool FloraBlock::needsRefill (  )  const [inline]
